code: const API='http://localhost:8000';export async function listMasters(){const r=await fetch("".concat(API,"/masters"));return r.json();}export async function createMaster(body){const r=await fetch("".concat(API,"/masters"),{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(body)});return r.json();}export async function createTransaction(body){const r=await fetch("".concat(API,"/transactions"),{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(body)});return r.json();}export async function reportDaily(params){const qs=new URLSearchParams(params);const r=await fetch("".concat(API,"/reports/daily?").concat(qs.toString()));return r.json();}export async function ledger(entity_code,params){const qs=new URLSearchParams(params);const r=await fetch("".concat(API,"/reports/ledger?entity_code=").concat(entity_code,"&").concat(qs.toString()));return r.json();}
